summary: This document is an email forwarding a news article from NBC News about Jeffrey Epstein's non-prosecution agreement with federal prosecutors. The email highlights criticism of the deal and calls for accountability for those who arranged it.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the forwarded news article, which criticizes the federal non-prosecution agreement he received.

events.title: Criticism of Epstein's Non-Prosecution Agreement
events.description: A news article argues that Jeffrey Epstein's deal with federal prosecutors was abnormal and that the men who arranged it should be held accountable.

keyFacts: The document is an email forwarding a news article critical of Jeffrey Epstein's non-prosecution agreement with federal prosecutors.
The article claims the deal was 'not normal' and calls for accountability for the men who arranged it.
The email was sent on March 1, 2019, indicating ongoing public and media scrutiny of the case years after the original agreement.
